hooks.command: if [ -n "$TMUX" ]; then tmux list-clients -F '#{client_tty}' | while read tty; do printf '\033]777;notify;Claude Code;Task completed\007' > "$tty"; done; else printf '\033]777;notify;Claude Code;Task completed\007' > /dev/tty; fi &

if [ -n "$TMUX" ]; then tmux list-clients -F '#{client_tty}' | while read tty; do printf '\033]777;notify;Claude Code;Question for you\007' > "$tty"; done; else printf '\033]777;notify;Claude Code;Question for you\007' > /dev/tty; fi &

if [ -n "$TMUX" ]; then tmux list-clients -F '#{client_tty}' | while read tty; do printf '\033]777;notify;Claude Code;Permission required\007' > "$tty"; done; else printf '\033]777;notify;Claude Code;Permission required\007' > /dev/tty; fi &
